text: Cynthia is a 1947 American comedy drama movie directed by Robert Z. Leonard and was based on the 1945 play The Rich, Full Life by Vi√±a Delmar. It stars Elizabeth Taylor, George Murphy, S. Z. Sakall, Mary Astor, Gene Lockhart, Spring Byington, Morris Ankrum and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 comedy movies Category:1947 drama movies Category:1940s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Robert Z. Leonard
title: Cynthia (movie)
